message: I'm looking for a SXSW schedule with ICS files (for use with iCal, etc.) that doesn't require me to sign up for a service first. Seems like a no-brainer that the official SXSW schedule would provide this, but it doesn't, as far as I can tell.
Never mind. I was under the impression that using the official SXSW scheduler required a login on their SXSW "social" service, but you can just create any random account.
And this is actually quite good: http://austin2011.sched.org/

You can create a schedule with http://sxsw.lanyrd.com and save the ics schedule of seasons you are attending and ones you are tracking - you can browse and filter without signing in but to se what sessions your friends are attending or build your own schedule you can sign in with Twitter.
(disclaimer: it's a site I working on but it's really cool)
We can also email you afte sxsw with coverage, slides notes video etc of seasons you tracked or attended
